original: Watchit shall have the exclusive right to sell third party advertising as sponsors of their content and will have the right to brand the content under the Watchit brand and place a “bug” on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark.
ollama_generated:
Upon this agreement, the sole discretion for marketing third-party advertising within the scope of our content lies with You (Watchit). Moreover, You shall be entitled to affix the Watchit brand to the content and incorporate a distinctive "bug" or watermark on the screen, clearly indicating that the content bears the Watchit trademark.

In this revised clause, we have shifted the exclusivity of selling third-party advertising from us (the service provider) to you (the client). This change inverts the original condition and places responsibility for marketing third-party advertising with the client.
